category-def.name: ocl2ac_category_1
category-def.label: OCL2AC
category-def.description:
OCL2AC: OCL2AC is a tool based on the Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) and can automatically update model transfomrations to guarantee a set of constraints. It consists of two main components:
(1) OCL2GC: translates OCL constraints to graph constraints. (2) GC2AC: integrates graph constraints as application conditions for transformation rules.
Each component can be used independently as an Eclipse-based tool.
Authors: Nebras Nassar et al. nassarn@mathematik.uni-marburg.de
